b9c57620-f2b3-404b-90c8-1a865cf9b05b.description: WIAL Certified Action Learning Coach (CALC) certification-holder is trained (32+ hours), has served as a coach in at least four Action Learning sessions. Has demonstrated knowledge, proficient application and learning of Action Learning methodology. Earner has demonstrated competence in using a variety of behaviors and skills working with clients. The CALC certification must be renewed every two years.
b9c57620-f2b3-404b-90c8-1a865cf9b05b.name: WIAL Certified Action Learning Coach

issuer.summary: issued by World Institute for Action Learning (WIAL)

alignments.name: ICF
alignments.description: WIAL is an ICF-accredited training provider and the WIAL CALC certification is an accredited ICF CCE program.

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of 32 hours of specific training with WIAL.
Completion of report of two 90-minute Action Learning sessions, of which at least one got to a solution, with descriptions, interventions, reflections and learnings.
Has been the Action Learning Coach in, minimum, two 90-minute Action Learning sessions and at least one of them got to solution.

issuer.summary: issued by World Institute for Action Learning (WIAL)

badge_template_activities.title: Speaker at WIAL Conference 2021

0c43497c-6a52-4dd0-a778-44bd217f9944.description: WIAL Senior Action Learning Coach (SALC) Certification-holder is trained (32+ hours), has had 100 hours of experience with Action Learning, with at least 50 hours coaching. Has coached in a long term project (weeks or months long). Has led*, with a Master Action Learning Coach - MALC observing, the Action Learning Certification program. And has mentored at least one participant to become a CALC. The SALC must be renewed every two years.
0c43497c-6a52-4dd0-a778-44bd217f9944.name: WIAL Senior Action Learning Coach

issuer.summary: issued by World Institute for Action Learning (WIAL)

alignments.name: ICF
alignments.description: WIAL is an ICF-accredited training provider and the WIAL CALC certification is an accredited ICF CCE program.

badge_template_activities.title: Has been a WIAL Certified Action Learning Coach - CALC or WIAL Professional Action Learning Coach - PALC

Completion of report with the listing of Action Learning sessions documenting the challenges and learnings encountered during the longer term Action Learning project (multi-session over weeks). (PALCs will have fulfilled this requirement during their PALC application.)
Has been the Action Learning Coach in, minimun, 4 sessions over several weeks. (PALCs will have fulfilled this requirement during their PALC application.)
Has had, minimun of, 100 hours of Action Learning experience (of which at least 50 hours in coaching). (PALCs will have fulfilled this requirement during their PALC application.)

Has led*, with a Master Action Learning Coach - MALC observing, the Action Learning Certification program in which participants build progressively their proficiency in coaching teams engaged in: (1) Action Learning, (2) the development and implementation of an Action Learning project, and (3) reflection and writing on their Action Learning experiences.
Has mentored at least one of the participants to become a CALC.

4d386ae4-5cc9-46b2-9422-b9383656b58b.description: WIAL Professional Action Learning Coach (PALC) Certification-holder is trained (32+ hours), has had 100 hours of experience, with at least 50 hours coaching. Has coached in a long term project (weeks or months long). Has demonstrated knowledge and proficient presentation of Introduction of Action Learning or Leading with Questions observed by a SALC or MALC. The PALC must be renewed every two years.
4d386ae4-5cc9-46b2-9422-b9383656b58b.name: WIAL Professional Action Learning Coach

issuer.summary: issued by World Institute for Action Learning (WIAL)

alignments.name: ICF
alignments.description: WIAL is an ICF-accredited training provider and the WIAL CALC certification is an accredited ICF CCE program.

badge_template_activities.title: Has been a WIAL Certified Action Learning Coach - CALC.
Completion of report with the listing of Action Learning sessions documenting the challenges and learnings encountered, including a longer term Action Learning project (multi-session over weeks).
Has been the Action Learning Coach in, minimun, 4 sessions over several weeks.
Has had, minimun of, 100 hours of Action Learning experience (of which at least 50 hours in coaching).
Has led Introduction to Action Learning or Leading with Questions program observed by a SALC or MALC.

f59bfb66-a9c2-4791-ac9e-771f86c043ae.description: WIAL Master Action Learning Coach (MALC) certification-holder is a SALC who has had 500 hours of experience coaching/ training/ consulting in Action Learning with diverse clients and projects. Has published, presented and considered an expert in WIAL Action Learning. Is a noted presenter at conferences in both WIAL and non-WIAL forums, and has published articles in WIAL and non-WIAL publications related to the WIAL method of Action Learning. The MALC must be renewed every two years.
f59bfb66-a9c2-4791-ac9e-771f86c043ae.name: WIAL Master Action Learning Coach

issuer.summary: issued by World Institute for Action Learning (WIAL)

alignments.name: ICF
alignments.description: WIAL is an ICF-accredited training provider and the WIAL CALC certification is an accredited ICF CCE program.

badge_template_activities.title: Has been a WIAL Senior Action Learning Coach - SALC
Has had, minimum of, 500 hours of experience coaching/ training/ consulting in Action Learning with diverse clients and projects.
Has mentored at least one participant to become a CALC.
Has presented in WIAL and non-WIAL forums as an Action Learning expert.

Has led the Action Learning Certification program in which participants build progressively their proficiency in coaching teams engaged in: (1) Action Learning, (2) the development and implementation of an Action Learning project, and (3) reflection and writing on their Action Learning experiences.

731d2e16-d5c1-4f94-baa5-c4d6b2282116.description: Demonstrated high impact applications of WIAL Action Learning. • Number and quality of WIAL action learning programs • Impact of Action Learning projects within an organization and/or clients • Use of internal and/or external WIAL Action Learning coaches • Support from top management • Internal and external publicity
731d2e16-d5c1-4f94-baa5-c4d6b2282116.name: WIAL Application Award RunnerUp 2021

issuer.summary: issued by World Institute for Action Learning (WIAL)

badge_template_activities.title: • All the mandatory fields in the award submission form must be completed to be eligible for the award. • Action Learning projects must have been completed within the award qualifying period of 01 Sep 2020 – 31 July 2021. • Past winners of the WIAL Award cannot apply with the same project again. • In the event of 3rd party nomination, the person putting in the nomination must have gained the consent of the nominee.

• The nominee of company awards must be operational at the time of submission and the nominee of individual awards must have maintained his/her coach certification with WIAL. • The decision of the Awards Committee on eligibility and selection is final and binding. No appeal or correspondence shall be allowed. • If a company or individual is selected for any of the award categories, they must use their best endeavors to ensure that they are available for publicity initiatives by WIAL.

60b650f5-3f7f-46a0-9f41-618674c5c6d8.description: • A book or article that contributes to the body of knowledge about action learning • Published between June 2019 and May 2021 • For an article, it should be published in a widely distributed, high quality journal (trade or professional) • Research methodology can be applied (case study) or theoretical (qualitative or quantitative) • You are willing to present your research or conclusions at a WIAL Global Conference
